Founder of the Gupta Dynasty

The progenitor and founder of the Gupta Empire. He is called 'Adiraja' in the Pune copper plate (of Prabhavatigupta).

ЁЯУМ
Important Facts (Exam Points)
  • Title: Maharaja - This is considered a feudatory title.
  • Chinese Traveler I-tsing: In the 7th century, I-tsing mentioned that 500 years earlier, a 'Che-li-ki-to' (Sri Gupta) had built a temple for Chinese pilgrims in Mrigashikavana (near Sarnath).
